item.title: Loads of dog dirt again, 5th February
item.description:

item.category: Road marking white lines or studs

item.title: Multiple lights not working, 5th February
item.description:
I have reported this a couple of months ago. It is very dangerous leaving the A417 onto the slip road as it is very dark. The yellow bollard is not lighting up when driving towards it you could easily crash into it. Why has it not been sorted. The lampposts/lighting are there for a reason.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Interchange, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting is not working, 5th February
item.description:
Lampost located at top of cul de sac has not been working for 2/3 days leaving multiple houses in the dark. Nearest property 10 Selworthy, Up Hatherley, Chelt
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Selworthy, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Potholes down whole of albert road, 5th February
item.description:
The potholes are becoming a real problem down the whol eof albert road. You have circled some as white but up the top end if going up towards teh race course the amount of holes and size of them is increasing every day. Please can someone come and inspect the whole road. It all needs a resurface. The road is used so much. I am local and it is very bad. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole by zebra crossing, 5th February

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hill Court Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
